prompts: Create a playful Pokemon that resembles a beaver, with a bushy tail and big front teeth.
I want a cute, fluffy Pokemon that lives in forests and loves to collect berries.
Generate a Pokemon inspired by a lumberjack, wearing a cozy brown coat and sporting a cheerful expression.
Make a friendly Pokemon that enjoys building dams and has a strong connection to nature.
Imagine a small, round Pokemon that is always hungry and has a knack for finding hidden snacks.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of hard work, with a robust body and a bright smile.
Show me a Pokemon that loves to swim and can be found near rivers and lakes.
